item.title: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Outage due to Scheduled Maintenance Summary: The company will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during the specified time, indicating a major outage affecting the platform.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 6, 17:00 - 18:00 GMT

Mar 5, 13:02 GMT
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.
